addon.name: TV Portal
addon.provider-name: Original work by Spoyser, DixieDean - Modded by noobsandnerds.com

extension.description: A fully customisable EPG which can link to any addons, streams and even PVR clients within Kodi. This is the only EPG that offers the ability to import your own XML TV listings and convert into a fast responsive db driven TV Guide. Big thanks to twinther for the original TV Guide code and the On-Tapp.TV team for the code on which this was forked from.
